description: A semiconductor fabrication plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns and predict potential issues before they cause downtime.  The goal is to minimize production disruptions and maximize equipment lifespan.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned downtime in the semiconductor fabrication facility by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on real-time sensor data analysis.
constraints: data_access_restrictions: Only authorized sensor data streams are accessible
model_update_frequency: Maximum of one model update per day
maintenance_window_constraints: Preventative maintenance must be scheduled outside of peak production hours
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a 300mm wafer fabrication facility)
